column4: hello - anybody knows of a working cd-printer/software combination for ubuntu ?
ok, but for the printing itself i'd use Glabels for example
i do ask because some time ago i did that using a espon r285 with glabels it it was quite a hassle
does brasero not have a cd printing addon?
yes but only for the cover - not the cd itself
seems like libreoffice can print them too
many thx - i'll take a closer look
